name: Bytepark
description:
We are an owner-managed, technology-driven digital communications agency based in Berlin-Mitte. Thanks to our passion for open source technologies, we offer first-class web development and create high-performance classical and mobile applications.
Founded in 2001 in Berlin-Kreuzberg, we have gained a great deal of experience from over 350 client projects, including content management systems, online shops and framework applications. We look forward to hearing from you.
